description: Strava is a social fitness network and app designed for cyclists and runners.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_CREATE_AN_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: Creates a manual activity for an athlete, requires activity:write scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_EXPLORE_SEGMENTS
capabilities.description: Returns the top 10 segments matching a specified query.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_EXPORT_ROUTE_GPX
capabilities.description: Returns a GPX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_EXPORT_ROUTE_TCX
capabilities.description: Returns a TCX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: Returns the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ACTIVITY_STREAMS
capabilities.description: Returns the given activity's streams. Requires activity:read scope. Requires activity:read_all scope for Only Me activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ACTIVITY_ZONES
capabilities.description: Summit Feature. Returns the zones of a given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ATHLETE_STATS
capabilities.description: Returns the activity stats of an athlete. Only includes data from activities set to Everyone visibilty.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_AUTHENTICATED_ATHLETE
capabilities.description: Returns the currently authenticated athlete. Tokens with profile:read_all scope will receive a detailed athlete representation; all others will receive a summary representation.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_CLUB
capabilities.description: Returns a given club using its identifier.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_EQUIPMENT
capabilities.description: Returns an equipment using its identifier.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ROUTE
capabilities.description: Returns a route using its identifier. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ROUTE_STREAMS
capabilities.description: Returns the given route's streams. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_SEGMENT
capabilities.description: Returns the specified segment. read_all scope required in order to retrieve athlete-specific segment information, or to retrieve private segments.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_SEGMENT_EFFORT
capabilities.description: Returns a segment effort from an activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires subscription.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_SEGMENT_EFFORT_STREAMS
capabilities.description: Returns a set of streams for a segment effort completed by the authenticated athlete. Requires read_all scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_SEGMENT_STREAMS
capabilities.description: Returns the given segment's streams. Requires read_all scope for private segments.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_UPLOAD
capabilities.description: Returns an upload for a given identifier. Requires activity:write scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_GET_ZONES
capabilities.description: Returns the the authenticated athlete's heart rate and power zones. Requires profile:read_all.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_ACTIVITY_COMMENTS
capabilities.description: Returns the comments on the given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_ACTIVITY_KUDOERS
capabilities.description: Returns the athletes who kudoed an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_ACTIVITY_LAPS
capabilities.description: Returns the laps of an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_ATHLETE_ACTIVITIES
capabilities.description: Returns the activities of an athlete for a specific identifier. Requires activity:read. Only Me activities will be filtered out unless requested by a token with activity:read_all.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_ATHLETE_CLUBS
capabilities.description: Returns a list of the clubs whose membership includes the authenticated athlete.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_ATHLETE_ROUTES
capabilities.description: Returns a list of the routes created by the authenticated athlete. Private routes are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_CLUB_ACTIVITIES
capabilities.description: Retrieve recent activities from members of a specific club. The authenticated athlete must belong to the requested club in order to hit this endpoint. Pagination is supported. Athlete profile visibility is respected for all activities.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_CLUB_ADMINISTRATORS
capabilities.description: Returns a list of the administrators of a given club.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_CLUB_MEMBERS
capabilities.description: Returns a list of the athletes who are members of a given club.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_SEGMENT_EFFORTS
capabilities.description: Returns a set of the authenticated athlete's segment efforts for a given segment. Requires subscription.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_LIST_STARRED_SEGMENTS
capabilities.description: List of the authenticated athlete's starred segments. Private segments are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_STAR_SEGMENT
capabilities.description: Stars/Unstars the given segment for the authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_UPDATE_ATHLETE
capabilities.description: Update the currently authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

capabilities.name: STRAVA_UPLOAD_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: Uploads a new data file to create an activity from. Requires activity:write scope.
